description:
The following use cases are not supported by this SOP:

        1. Windows instances
        2. Un-partitioned disks
        3. No FS on the disk/partition

SizeGib.description: (Required) The target size to increase the volume to (in GiB)

InstanceIdentifier.description: (Required) The identifier of the instance requiring increase of volume size

DeviceName.description: (Required) The device name (such as /dev/sdh) is to be increased

Partition.description: (Required) The partition which is to be increased

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Required) The ARN of the role that allows Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.

mainSteps.description: Start the timer when SOP starts
mainSteps.name: RecordStartTime

mainSteps.description: Describe volumes by instance and device [DescribeVolumes](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeVolumes.html)
mainSteps.name: DescribeInstanceVolume

mainSteps.description: Check if requested volume size is greater than current. If not, we know to skip to the end.
mainSteps.name: CheckLargerVolume

inputs.Script:
def script_handler(params: dict, context):
    return params['CurrentSizeGiB'] >= params['SizeGib']

mainSteps.description: Wait until volume is updated to new value.
mainSteps.name: WaitForVolumeSize
